content: *may 2013 i have adjusted the gauge and sizing for this due to comments about the hat running large please feel free to pm me with any questions * here is a sunhat for babies and kids that shades the eyes and keeps that hot sun off those little heads the positive ease is meant to keep a child comfortable while the eyelets allow them to stay cool for the boys check out the partner hat dear henry 1 there has been mention that this runs big the hat isn t meant to stretch at all and is suppose to be loose on the head 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/dear-henry
